sn35.158:3.1: 158 Focus, the Interior, and the End of Relishing
sn35.158:4.1: “Mendicants, focus on the source of the eye. Truly see the impermanence of the eye.
sn35.158:4.2: When a mendicant does this, they become disillusioned with the eye.
sn35.158:4.3: When relishing ends, greed ends. When greed ends, relishing ends.
sn35.158:4.5: When relishing and greed end, the mind is said to be well freed.
